amendment.description: To ensure that the critical surface transportation needs of the United States are made a priority by prohibiting funds from being used on lower-priority projects, such as transportation museums and landscaping.

action.text: Motion to table amendment SA 739 agreed to in Senate by Yea-Nay Vote. 59 - 39. Record Vote Number: 170.

Amendment SA 739 proposed by Senator McCain to Amendment SA 738. (consideration: CR S6633-6634, S6644-6645, S6646-6648; text: CR S6633) To ensure that the critical surface transportation needs of the United States are made a priority by prohibiting funds from being used on lower-priority projects, such as transportation museums and landscaping.
Roll call votes on amendments in Senate: Motion to table amendment SA 739 agreed to in Senate by Yea-Nay Vote. 59 - 39. Record Vote Number: 170.
Senate amendment proposed (on the floor): Amendment SA 739 proposed by Senator McCain to Amendment SA 738.
